name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Ray of Jewelry【#ホロ0期生ライブ2024】 [AUu9pSkkgaY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Sakura Miko and Hoshimachi Suisei perform 'Sugar Rush' in a colorful, energetic stage setting.
scenes.song_name: シュガーラッシュ (Sugar Rush)

scenes.description: Sakura Miko, Tokino Sora, and AZKi perform 'Sakura Kaze', a nostalgic and heartfelt song.

subtitles.original: やっぱりポッポッポッにしたい
subtitles.english: I still want to make it pop-pop-pop!

subtitles.original: やわなポッポッ諸症状で
subtitles.english: With soft pop-pop symptoms,

subtitles.original: 私世界バッテ・オーライがって
subtitles.english: I'm getting all right with the world's battery.

subtitles.original: ノンノンなんてなってんだ
subtitles.english: What's with all the "non-non"?

subtitles.original: 湿っぽいポイでさ歌っちゃって
subtitles.english: Throwing away the dampness and singing along.

subtitles.original: どうにかなることと
subtitles.english: Things that'll work out,

subtitles.original: ならないことね　わくわく
subtitles.english: and things that won't. So exciting!

subtitles.original: さくらってモラみこの時代よ
subtitles.english: This is the era of Sakura and Mora-Miko!

subtitles.original: 知りたい　嘘つきたい　勝ちたいよ　日向
subtitles.english: I want to know, I want to lie, I want to win, Sunbeam!

subtitles.original: 未体験じゃんけんだ　オイ　オイ
subtitles.english: It's an unexperienced rock-paper-scissors. Oi! Oi!

subtitles.original: ヤバイ　Sugar Rush　アゲチュンチュンにさせて
subtitles.english: Oh no! Sugar Rush, make me feel all hyped up!

subtitles.original: もっと　もっと　おたべ　召しませ
subtitles.english: Have some more, more, please eat up!

subtitles.original: 変幻自在のドキドキが
subtitles.english: This ever-changing heart-pounding feeling,

subtitles.original: Because ぱんぱかぱんぱぱらっぱんでもう一回
subtitles.english: Because pan-paka-pan-paparappan, one more time!

subtitles.original: Sugar Rush　アゲチュンチュンばやしして
subtitles.english: Sugar Rush, give me that hyped-up rhythm!

subtitles.original: もっと　もっと　踊る　求めて
subtitles.english: More and more, seeking to dance!

subtitles.original: 全然足んないよ　そんな数じゃ
subtitles.english: It's not enough at all, with just that amount!

subtitles.original: Because ぱんぱかぱんぱぱらっぱんでもう一回
subtitles.english: Because pan-paka-pan-paparappan, one more time!

subtitles.original: 教えて Sugar Beat 触れないと
subtitles.english: Tell me, Sugar Beat, if I don't touch it...

subtitles.original: やっぱポッポッポッにしたい
subtitles.english: I still want to make it pop-pop-pop!

subtitles.original: 遊びたい騒ぎたい全部忘れたい泣きたい気持ち　しくしくしくしく
subtitles.english: I want to play, party, forget everything, a feeling like crying, sob-sob-sob!

subtitles.original: 頭と体バラバラ　まだまだ行けるわ長距離
subtitles.english: Head and body all apart, I can still go the distance!

subtitles.original: 強がり快感　パニックになっちゃえば
subtitles.english: Feeling good being tough, just getting into a panic!

subtitles.original: 最初はグッとやる気満々
subtitles.english: At first, I'm all full of motivation!

subtitles.original: だけどちょっと辛いからダンダン
subtitles.english: But it's a bit tough, so bit by bit...

subtitles.original: マイクとパッと切り替えて
subtitles.english: Quickly switching with the mic!

subtitles.original: 本気負けで愛顧それも怖キャラ
subtitles.english: Losing for real and getting favors, that's a scary character too!

subtitles.original: 最初はグッとやる気満々
subtitles.english: At first, I'm all full of motivation!

subtitles.original: だけどちょっと辛いからダンダン
subtitles.english: But it's a bit tough, so bit by bit...

subtitles.original: マイクとパッと切り替えなきゃ
subtitles.english: I've gotta switch quickly with the mic!

subtitles.original: ダメダメダメダメ
subtitles.english: No, no, no, no!

subtitles.original: とんでもないことは　望んでいるのだ　わくわく
subtitles.english: I'm wishing for something unbelievable. So exciting!

subtitles.original: しながら死にたくて　笑いたい
subtitles.english: I want to die while doing it, and I want to laugh!

subtitles.original: 叶えたい　上がっちゃうの止めないで
subtitles.english: I want to make it come true, don't stop me from rising!

subtitles.original: 安い世界なんて　ポイ　ポイ
subtitles.english: Toss away this cheap world!

subtitles.original: ださい情緒まちまえ　エイ　エイ
subtitles.english: Mix up those tacky emotions. Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: ヤバイ　Sugar Rush　アゲチュンチュンにさせて
subtitles.english: Oh no! Sugar Rush, make me feel all hyped up!

subtitles.original: もっと　もっと　おたべ　召しませ
subtitles.english: Have some more, more, please eat up!

subtitles.original: 変幻自在のドキドキが
subtitles.english: This ever-changing heart-pounding feeling,

subtitles.original: Because ぱんぱかぱんぱぱらっぱんでもう一回
subtitles.english: Because pan-paka-pan-paparappan, one more time!

subtitles.original: Sugar Rush　アゲチュンチュンばやしして
subtitles.english: Sugar Rush, give me that hyped-up rhythm!

subtitles.original: もっと　もっと　踊る　求めて
subtitles.english: More and more, seeking to dance!

subtitles.original: 全然足んないよ　そんな数じゃ
subtitles.english: It's not enough at all, with just that amount!

subtitles.original: Because ぱんぱかぱんぱぱらっぱんでもう一回
subtitles.english: Because pan-paka-pan-paparappan, one more time!

subtitles.original: 教えて Sugar Beat 触れないと
subtitles.english: Tell me, Sugar Beat, if I don't touch it...

subtitles.original: 化けて出ちゃうよ　死なないよ
subtitles.english: I'll come out as a ghost! I won't die!

subtitles.original: Because ぱんぱかぱんぱぱらっぱん
subtitles.english: Because pan-paka-pan-paparappan...

subtitles.original: ダメダメダメダメ
subtitles.english: No, no, no, no!

subtitles.original: ノーダメダメダメダメ　Oh yeah
subtitles.english: No, no, no, no, no! Oh yeah!

subtitles.original: サクラカゼ
subtitles.english: Sakura Kaze

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲・編曲：ハム
subtitles.english: Lyrics, Composition, & Arrangement: Hamu

subtitles.original: 窓に当たる陽を横目で眺めて　そっと陰る木の根に一人で比べてた
subtitles.english:
Gazing sideways at the sun hitting the window,
I quietly compared myself to the shadows of the tree roots.

subtitles.original: 積もる溜息を吹き払うように　そんな私を君が見つけてくれたんだ
subtitles.english:
As if blowing away my accumulating sighs,
you were the one who found me like that.

subtitles.original: そう　それは恋のような温もりを全部　君に笑顔咲かせたら
subtitles.english:
Yes, if I could make all that warmth, like love,
bloom into a smile for you...

subtitles.original: サクラカゼに踊る空　君と出会ったこの場所で
subtitles.english:
The sky dances in the cherry blossom breeze,
in this place where I met you.

subtitles.original: どれくらいの想い出ぎゅっと　溢れそうになるかな
subtitles.english:
How many memories will I hold tight
until they're about to overflow?

subtitles.original: 君と流した涙は　明日の笑顔の糧にしよう
subtitles.english:
The tears I shed with you,
let's make them nourishment for tomorrow's smiles.

subtitles.original: 膝をついてたってほら　何度だっていいよ
subtitles.english:
Look, even if you fall to your knees,
it's okay, however many times it takes.

subtitles.original: 意地を張って恥をかいて　いじけたってそれでも
subtitles.english: Being stubborn, being embarrassed, even sulking, despite it all...

subtitles.original: 君が傍で見守ってくれたこと
subtitles.english: The fact that you watched over me by my side...

subtitles.original: 分かってるから
subtitles.english: I understand that now.

subtitles.original: 追い風を受けて止まらない日々も　そっと挫けそうになって心が渦巻いた
subtitles.english:
Even on days when I couldn't stop, pushed by the tailwind,
my heart would swirl, on the verge of giving up.

subtitles.original: 積もる溜息でまた泣きかけても　温かな手でずっと支えてくれたんだ
subtitles.english:
Even when I was about to cry again from accumulating sighs,
you were always there to support me with your warm hands.
